Monero Flags (QBMF)

Monero agent and flags for use in Kerbal Space Program.

By zer0Kerbal, originally by @QuickBASIC

adopted with express permission and brought to you by KerbSimpleCo

See more

Help Wanted

Spoiler
  • Marketing Images and Videos such as hero shots, animated gifs, short highlights
  • Translations: See the README in the Localization folder for instructions for adding or improving translations. There is also the quickstart guide. GitHub push is the best way to contribute. Additions and corrections welcome!
  • Have a request? Glad to have them, kindly submit through GitHub.

Localization

  •  English
  • your translation here

Installation Directions

Most recent releases only available via CurseForge/OverWolf Website/App

Dependencies

  • Kerbal Space Program 

Recommends

  • By QuickBASIC

    • KIS No Fun (QBNF)

Legal Mumbo Jumbo (License provenance)

Spoiler

Author (2) - zer0Kerbal

Forum: Thread - Source: GitHub - Download CurseForge
LIC:  

Original (ROOT) (0) - Author: @QuickBASIC

Forum: Thread - Download: CurseForge - Source: CurseForge
LIC:  

This project is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution Share-Alike 4.0 license. All contributors will be listed in CONTRIBUTORS.md.

  • Be reasonable about attribution. (If difficult to credit e.g. screenshot of KSP, don't bother.)
  • You're welcome to attribute individual contributors or just "MoneroFlags".
  • Include CONTRIBUTORS.md if reasonable.

All contributions must be made under a license that allows their inclusion into this project, for example:

  • CC-0
  • CC-BY
  • CC-BY-SA
  • the Unlicense
  • WTFPL

This project is based on CrowdSourcedFlags by dmxz and may include some source text.

Rules for contributions

Your flag must be...

  • under a suitable license. If you don't name a specific licence when contributing, CC-BY-SA is assumed.
  • not a duplicate or near-duplicate of one already in the pack or in stock.
  • Safe-for-work.
  • a PNG, exactly 256x160 pixels.
  • of good quality (not a badly-scaled, JPEG artifacts, in the wrong aspect ratio, etc.)

Flags for other cryptocurrencies or cryptocurrency cultures (memes) will be accepted if well designed.

Disclaimer(s)

  • All bundled mods are distributed under their own licenses

  • All assets, including but not limited to: animations, models, sounds and textures are distributed under their own licenses. 

  • see Notices for more legal Mumbo Jumbo

Answered question

54 minutes ago, theJesuit said:

I'm not sure what this mod does.

Just a bunch of flags

54 minutes ago, theJesuit said:

I'm not sure what this mod does.

it is a small flag  pack.

This is probably one of the most magnificently comprehensive mod/release posts for something that's basically a small collection of flags.

Don't get me wrong, I'm delighted by this.

--I thought this was some sort of parody flag for Monsanto or something similar -- but it's a crypto trading service?

Edited September 9, 2021 by Beetlecat

53 minutes ago, Beetlecat said:

Monsanto or something similar

Good idea for contract agency mod. 

//also it's not a service, just an well-obfuscated cryprocurrency.

1 hour ago, Hohmannson said:

Good idea for contract agency mod. 

//also it's not a service, just an well-obfuscated cryprocurrency.

Hah. Nice!

Well, that's definitely a suggestion for @zer0Kerbal.  Make this into an agency and we can launch mining rigs and server farms into orbit...

6 hours ago, Beetlecat said:

This is probably one of the most magnificently comprehensive mod/release posts for something that's basically a small collection of flags.

99.999% boilerplate - so that makes it pure Gold right? Maybe it should recommend 'The Gold Standard' mod?

6 hours ago, Beetlecat said:

Don't get me wrong, I'm delighted by this.

--I thought this was some sort of parody flag for Monsanto or something similar -- but it's a crypto trading service?

Same. it was only fair (imho) that I adopt all four of @QuickBASIC's mods at once. Also made the boilerplate much easier. Heck, the four mods even got sequential forum post numbers!

@DasSkeletteven cracked a joke on Github about just how many suggested mods it had. 

I believe it is an actual crypto like Doge... 

5 hours ago, Hohmannson said:

Good idea for contract agency mod. 

//also it's not a service, just an well-obfuscated cryprocurrency.

Agree - and yeppers. I was having those same thoughts as I was working on it. I would have done it except I've never written an Agency... guess it would be  focused.... 

4 hours ago, Beetlecat said:

Well, that's definitely a suggestion for @zer0Kerbal.  Make this into an agency and we can launch mining rigs and server farms into orbit...

Any help would be greatly appreciated - Heck if you write it - put Duke Dr. General @BeetlecatKermin PH.D Economics as its main agent! And a @Hohmannson Kermin as its CFO!

If no takers - I will try, time permitting to make one - it already has flags!

https://github.com/zer0Kerbal/MoneroFlags/issues/5 https://github.com/zer0Kerbal/MoneroFlags/discussions/6

I was half tempted to name the agents 'Au'gust and 'Ag'gie

Edited September 10, 2021 by zer0Kerbal

Never done one before, but it's supposed to look like this. Not sure if you can make agents with personalities, mostl likely not. There is Agents.cfg in squad folder listing all traits.

Spoiler

AGENT
{
    name = XMR
    title = Monero
    description = A growing IT startup providing anonymous kryptocurrency. Despite accusations of supporting illegal snacks trade, they mostly invest in high-risk industry such as aerospace.

    logoURL = URL
    logoScaledURL = URL
    
    mentality = Startup
    mentality = EasyGoing
    mentality = Commercial
    mentality = Patient
}

Just saw this thread and figured I'd answer.

Yes an entire mod for a couple cryptocurrency flags. Crypto enthusiasts like to say their coin is going to "go to the moon" or "moon", so it's a joke about Monero mooning by letting you take it to the mün.

I was hoping that other cryptocurrency flags could be added to make it a larger pack of flags, but that didn't happen.

Either way, I hope you enjoy and thanks again to @zer0Kerbalfor adopting my mod.

Version 1.0.0.0-release - <Hohmannson> edition

  • Released
    • 22 Apr 2023
    • For Kerbal Space Program 1.12.5

For best results - DO A CLEAN INSTALL; DELETE EXISTING INSTALLATION THEN RE-INSTALL

Download only from CurseForge
